text: Straffan () is a village in County Kildare, Ireland on the banks of the River Liffey, 25 km upstream of the Irish capital Dublin. With a population (according to the census of 2006) of 439 – an increase since 2002 of 32.2% – Straffan is the 31st most populous centre in County Kildare. ==Other websites== * Development Plan * Local area plan * Straffan Steam Museum Website Category:Villages in Ireland Category:County Kildare
title: Straffan
